description.narrative:
The most significant, expected project-level outcomes are the benefits to farmers and the positive environmental effects of the planned Best Available Techniques (BAT) investments. Beyond the project, IFC anticipates that the investment has the potential to promote market integration through improved competition and market enabling investments.
The project will have the following impact:
(i) Environmental and/or social benefits - IFC anticipates that, alongside improved operational efficiencies and lower costs of production, the project will have a significant positive effect on the environment. The BAT investment program financed by the project entails reductions in both water and energy use at Astarta's sugar plants. The project will also finance more modern and efficient machinery and equipment for the agriculture operations, enabling the Company to cultivate the land in a more sustainable manner.
(ii) Benefits for the Consumers - IFC anticipates that, given the Company's focus on staple crops and its export orientation, the project will have a strong contribution on food security. IFC expects the increase in production of grains and oilseeds to translate into food availability for about 500,000 additional people.
(iii) Benefits for the Farmers - IFC anticipates that the project will reach additional farmers through purchases of larger volumes of grains and oilseeds from third parties, investments in new storage capacities for third-party use, and new employment in agricultural operations at Astarta's own farms. IFC expects the construction of new storage facilities to address a significant infrastructure bottleneck for Ukraine's primary producers, enabling sales at more opportune times, expanding choices of who to sell to, and reducing port-harvest losses by up to 3,500 MT per year. IFC expects that these in turn will generate better incomes and more streamlined trading relationships.

mailing-address.narrative: Astarta Vyacheslav Chuk Head of Credit Department +380445931105 vchuk@astarta.ua 04070, Kiev, Pochayninska str., 38/44 http://www.astartakiev.com

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
